title: lvl 2 on here but lvl 22 on NA server help?

replies.body: now it says i'm lvl 23 but still won't let me post.

This has to do with how our systems are set up.  Boards and the League of Legends client are two completely separate systems and therefore communication between the two platforms sometimes takes a while.  Making a post on Boards should help forcibly sync your account info to Boards.

It should let you post within 24 hours of you making this post however.  Let me know if you are still experiencing any issues though!
